title: Run, do not walk
author: VD
content_html: The wife-from-Hell has now been released after serving seven whole months for shooting her sleeping husband in the back. No doubt she’s eager to start dating again; imagine being the poor unsuspecting guy on that first date. Or even worse, imagine the sort of saps who will know what’s up, but buy into the little coward’s sob story.
content_text:
The wife-from-Hell has now been released
after serving seven whole months
for shooting her sleeping husband in the back.  No doubt she’s eager to start dating again; imagine being the poor unsuspecting guy on that first date.  Or even worse, imagine the sort of saps who will know what’s up, but buy into the little coward’s sob story.
